Property.name: autoCreate
Property.comment: A DomHelper element spec, or true for a default element spec (defaults to {tag: 'input', type: 'text', size: '16', autocomplete: 'off'})

Property.name: hideTrigger
Property.comment: True to hide the trigger element and display only the base text field (defaults to false)

Property.name: triggerClass
Property.comment: A CSS class to apply to the trigger
